data.title: Polytech Nantes
data.heading: "Classe préparatoire intégrée" - Computer Science and Mathematics
description: <paragraph_t>"Classe préparatoire intégrée" is a two-year program that prepares students for engineering schools.</paragraph_t>

<paragraph_b>In my case, it has been done on top of my Bachelor's degree. This allowed me to get a general education like in a typical "Classe préparatoire" while also gaining experience in Computer Science thanks to the Bachelor's degree and internship.</paragraph_b>
